MainPage.NewVersionAvailable: A new version of Ethos Suite is available. Do you want to download the installer?
MainPage.InstallerHasBeenDownloaded: The latest installer has been downloaded successfully. Confirm to run the installation now?
MainPage.NoUpdateAvailable: No update available. You are running a latest version.

FirstUseGuide.BootloaderMinVersion: Chcete-li používat aplikaci Ethos Suite s rádiem FrSky, musí mít bootloader rádia verzi {{ value }} nebo novější.
FirstUseGuide.CheckBootloaderVersion: Stisknutím a podržením tlačítka [ENTER] na rádiu a zároveň stisknutím tlačítka Power On vstoupíte do režimu bootloaderu. Pokud se na obrazovce bootloaderu zobrazí verze 1.2.10 nebo novější, rádio je připraveno k připojení k Ethos Suite pomocí kabelu USB.
FirstUseGuide.UpdateBootloader: Pokud je verze bootloaderu starší než 1.2.10, pak při vypnutém rádiu připojte rádio přes USB kabel k Ethos Suite. Pro upgrade bootloaderu použijte Ethos Suite DFU flasher.

Welcome.P1: Před zahájením aktualizace firmwaru zálohujte soubory model.bin a radio.bin. Ethos Suite provádí konverzi modelu ze starší verze na novější, ale ne z nové na starou. Záložní soubory jsou potřeba pro návrat ke starším verzím.
Welcome.P2: Po aktualizaci zkontrolujte naprogramování modelu před letem, abyste se ujistili, že vše funguje správně.

ToolCommon.ErrorLoggedTo: Errors have been written to the crash log which is in the folder {{ path }}. If you cannot close this dialog please restart Ethos Suite.
ToolCommon.ReferToFAQ: Please refer to Document for a solution
ToolCommon.NotFRSKFile: Tento soubor není soubor .frsk a nemůžeme zkontrolovat jeho obsah. Upozorňujeme, že to může způsobit poškození vašeho zařízení!
ToolCommon.ConnectYourRadio: Please power on your radio and enter Bootloader or Ethos by following the tutorial above. And then connect the computer with the USB cable.
ToolCommon.ReceiveFailStatus: Operation failed. Radio has returned an error!
ToolCommon.RadioNoResponse: Operation aborted. Radio has no response.
ToolCommon.FSError: File operation error! The operation has been aborted.
ToolCommon.OnlineSettingsNotFound: The online configuration isn't loaded successfully.
ToolCommon.DevicesListNotFound: The devices list isn't loaded successfully.

ChooseVideoVersion.DialogText: Suite has detected that you are using a HD radio. But the video component version is missing. Please confirm your video component version carefully by following the bitmaps bellow.

DFUFlasher.NotSuitable: Tento soubor .frsk není vhodný pro vaše rádio. Upozorňujeme, že může dojít k poškození!
DFUFlasher.UnknownFile: Neznámý soubor. Upozorňujeme, že to může způsobit poškození vašeho zařízení!

DownloadCenter.ZipError: Zip file error. You may download the .frsk file manually from the official website.
DownloadCenter.FRSKNotMatchComponent: This .frsk file doesn't suitable for your hardware. The operation has been aborted!
DownloadCenter.FlashFRSKWithoutHardwareInfo: We cannot get the information of your hardware. So we can't determine whether this .frsk file is applicable to your hardware or not. Do you want to continue flashing?
DownloadCenter.NoFRSKFileFound: No .frsk file found in the downloaded zip
DownloadCenter.MultipleFRSKDetected: Multiple available .frsk file detected. Please select the .frsk file you want to flash

ImageManager.TheFollowingImagesFailedToTranscode: The following images failed to transcode:

RepairTool.FormatToolTitle: Format internal storage (X18 series, TW XLite series, XE series, X20 Pro)
RepairTool.FormatToolSubTitle: If your radio cannot read from NAND or the settings cannot be saved. Please connect to Suite with radio power on. Then try this tool.
RepairTool.RepairSucceeded: Repair Succeeded! Please reboot your radio manually.
RepairTool.ConfirmFormat: This operation will delete all the contents on your internal storage. Please make you have backed up all the models and radio settings. Do you want to continue formatting?
RepairTool.BootloaderNotSupport: This operation only support bootloader whose version is over 1.4.0. Please update your bootloader.
RepairTool.FactorySettingSubTitle: Restore your radio to factory settings.
RepairTool.RestoreSucceed: Restore factory settings successfully! Please reboot your radio manually.

RadioTool.CopyingAudioPackToRadio: Copying {{ lang }} audio pack to radio...
RadioTool.VersionNotSupportedToStartFirmware: The bootloader version doesn't support switching to firmware!
RadioTool.VersionNotSupportedToStartBootloader: The firmware version doesn't support switching to bootloader!
RadioTool.ComponentNotFound: The corresponding component could not be found!
RadioTool.AudioPathChanged: The following system audio folder(s) are no longer used by the firmware due to a system version upgrade. It is recommended to remove the folder. Is it okay to do so?
RadioTool.ConfirmUpdateBootloaderFirstly: The firmware of the selected release requires the updated bootloader. Or your radio won't work currectly. Do you confirm to update your bootloader firstly?
RadioTool.BackupOrContinueUpdate: It's recommended that you backup the contents of your radio before updating. Would you like to go to the backup page or continue updating?

ModelTool.SelectRestoreComponent: Select the file and components you want to restore
ModelTool.RestoreFile: Will restore the selected components in {{ file }} to your radio. This will overwrite the files with the same name in your radio.
ModelTool.SelectBackupComponent: Select components you want to back up
ModelTool.RemarksDescription: Write down some remarks for this backup
ModelTool.BackupNotMatchRadio: This backup doesn't match with your radio. Do you want to continue?

About.OpenSourceProjectsUsedBy: Open source projects used by {{ program }}:

SuiteSettings.PopupDialogWhenError: Popup dialog when a fatal error occurs
SuiteSettings.ClearCacheConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the cache?

Documentation.LuaDocDescription: Documentation to help you write your own Lua scripts.
Documentation.LuaExamplesDescription: Lua demo scripts on GitHub giving coding examples.
Documentation.SuiteFAQDescription: Frequently Asked Questions regarding Ethos Suite.
Documentation.EthosManualDescription: Ethos User Manuals in downloadable PDF format, including older versions.
Documentation.EthosGithubDescription: Link to the ETHOS-Feedback-Community Github, which hosts the Ethos Releases. It also allows users to raise Issues for consideration by the Ethos development team. To avoid duplication please review the existing Issues for problem reports and feature requests already raised by other users.

BootloaderGuide.BootloaderGuideTitle: Your firmware may not support auto switching. Please switch to bootloader manually by following the steps
BootloaderGuide.BootloaderGuideStep1: Unplug the USB cable and turn off your radio
BootloaderGuide.BootloaderGuideStep2: Press the POWER while holding the ENTER unter you see "Bootloader"
BootloaderGuide.BootloaderGuideStep3: Connect your radio to the computer and you will see "USB Connected"

FirmwareGuide.FirmwareGuideTitle: Your bootloader may not support auto switching. Please switch to firmware manually by following the steps
FirmwareGuide.FirmwareGuideStep1: Unplug the USB cable and turn off the bootloader
FirmwareGuide.FirmwareGuideStep2: Turn on your radio normally and wait until preflight check finished
FirmwareGuide.FirmwareGuideStep3: Connect your radio to the computer and select "Frsky Suite" on the pop up menu

FrskGuide.FrskGuideTitle: Auto flashing doesn't start successfully. Please flash the .frsk manually by following the steps
FrskGuide.FrskGuideStep1: Unplug the USB cable and enter the System - File Manager menu
FrskGuide.FrskGuideStep2: Find the device.frsk file in NAND or SD Card tab
FrskGuide.FrskGuideStep3: Flash your device by selecting the option in the pop up menu
FrskGuide.FrskGuideFinish: Connect your radio again and click on the "Finish" button when the flashing is complete

FlashGuide.FlashGuideTitle: Auto flashing doesn't start successfully. Please finish it manually by following the steps
FlashGuide.FlashGuideStep: Your firmware.bin is ready. Just unplug the USB cable and the flashing will start
FlashGuide.FlashGuideFinish: Connect your radio again and click on the "Finish" button when the flashing is complete

NandBootloaderGuide.NandBootloaderGuideTitle: Your bootloader is out of date. Please flash the bootloader manually by following the steps
NandBootloaderGuide.NandBootloaderGuideStep1: Make sure your computer has the DFU driver installed correctly
NandBootloaderGuide.NandBootloaderGuideStep2: Visit GitHub to download the bootloader of your corresponding radio
NandBootloaderGuide.NandBootloaderGuideStep3: Connect your radio it is turned off
NandBootloaderGuide.NandBootloaderGuideStep4: Go to the DFU flasher, select the bootloader.frsk you just downloaded and click "Flash"

LanguageManager.I18nDownloadSuccessfully: I18n files have been downloaded successfully
LanguageManager.FailToDownload: The following i18n files have been failed to download:

LuaDevTool.OpenSerialPortFailed: Failed to open serial port. Please check your driver!
LuaDevTool.VersionNotSupportedText: The current firmware version of your radio doesn't support the feature. Please update to 1.5.0 or higher.
LuaDevTool.NoFrskySerialPortDetected: No available Frsky radio serial port detected!
LuaDevTool.MultipleFrskyPortDetected: Multiple available Frsky radio serial port detected. Please select the serial port you want to open for debugging.
LuaDevTool.LuaInstallDescription: Help you install lua scripts from a .zip file to your radio
LuaDevTool.SelectScriptsDescription: Please select the script you want to install (the folder name where the script is located will be the script's name)
LuaDevTool.FollowingScriptsFailToInstall: The following scripts failed to install
LuaDevTool.NoScriptsFound: No scripts found in the .zip file!
